## Instructions

Alright, so we have gone through the basics of `ggplot2` and how to set up for some great data visualizations. In this tutorial, you will apply what was reviewed in the first part of the workshop and get to creating some beautiful plots. 


### Outline

* Geoms and Mappings
* Global vs Local
* Facets, scales, and coordinate systems
* Themes and labels

Let's get started...
